data: If Lieutenant-Colonel Algernon Sidney St. Johnstone, N.Y.N.G., had been in a normal condition, he would certainly have been aware of a peculiar buzzing sensation in the region of his upper left-hand vest pocket; but unfortunately it so happened that his actual physical state was most emphatically sub-normal.
Skinner, E. D.; Paul, Frank R. (Frank Rudolph), 1884-1963 [Illustrator]
